projects.title: Silver Medal Solution in the competition of ‚ÄúAtmospherical Physics using AI‚Äù
projects.description: Our solution leverages the PyTorch Lightning framework for training, utilizing transformer encoder-based architectures. We presented a column-wise ensemble method for post-processing. Other techniques, including rotary positional encoding, data normalization, and log transformation, also helped us achieve a good score.

projects.title: Cross Domain Text Summarization
projects.description: CRAFT (CRoss-domain Abstractive Summarization through Incremental Fine-Tuning): This project developed a general model for cross-domain text summarization. The methodology involves incrementally fine-tuning the model using the k most similar documents from a diverse collection of datasets. By leveraging incremental fine-tuning, CRAFT adapts effectively to multiple domains. In testing, it outperformed the baseline PEGASUS on the CNN/DailyMail dataset, demonstrating its capability to generalize across various NLP tasks.

projects.title: Interactive 3D Visualization
projects.description: This interactive 3D visualization project utilizes WebGL to generate a dynamic, real-time rendering environment directly in the browser. It features intuitive controls for manipulating the 3D environment, including zoom, rotate, and pan functionalities. Advanced shading and lighting techniques enhance the realism and depth of the 3D scenes, while creative distortion effects add a unique visual flair, further enriching the interactive experience.

projects.title: Text-To-Soft-Toy
projects.description: This project enables users to generate 3D printable molds for custom soft toys based on text prompts. When a phrase is entered, the system generates a voxel grid representing the toy‚Äôs morphology, which is then used to create a mold for 3D printing. After printing, users can pour silicone into the mold to create a physical soft toy. The backend was implemented using AWS Lambda for processing and S3 for storage, while the frontend includes interactive elements like text input bars and 3D previews.

projects.title: 3D Farming Simulator
projects.description: After spending countless hours immersed in Stardew Valley, I envisioned a 3D farming simulation experience. To bring this vision to life, I independently developed a 3D game demo using Unity and C#. The demo captures the essence of farming in a fully interactive 3D world. The project showcases my skills in game development, from designing the landscape to coding the game mechanics.

projects.title: Evolving Robots
projects.description: One approach to creating robots with optimal performance is through artificial evolution. In this experiment, we utilized this approach by allowing a computer to randomly generate robots and evolve them over hundreds of generations, with the ultimate goal of achieving good performance on a specific task. The task at hand was to move in an environment with high gravitational force (g=200), with the robot‚Äôs performance determined by its absolute movement on the xy-plane.
